title: Analyze Digital Twin for Emergency Vehicle Access
description: A fire chief wants to know if a new ladder truck can access a narrow street and deploy its ladder to reach a specific building.

tasks.description: Load the 3D model of the new ladder truck into the digital twin.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully imports the vehicle model.

tasks.description: Simulate driving the truck down the specified narrow street to check for clearance.
tasks.expected_outcome: The simulation shows the truck can fit down the street.

tasks.description: Simulate deploying the ladder from the street to the target building, checking for obstructions like power lines or trees.
tasks.expected_outcome: The simulation shows the ladder can reach the roof without any obstructions.

tasks.description: Generate a report confirming that the new truck is compatible with that location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a confirmation report to the fire department.
